name: Wizard quest (itch)
description: Game was mostly  done on last three days of 1 room rpg game jam and  because I started working on it to late I couldn't submit it for game jam.  Now I polished it to be playable but still will be probably unbalanced and maybe will have some other issues. Further more be patient with tutorial it is poorly designed  and read everything.  There cloud also be few misspells.
